itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, May 6, 2015
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, May 6, 2015
byline: Dan Weissmann, Gigi Douban, Lane Wallace, Matt Nesto and Mitchell Hartman
description: Airing on Wednesday, May 6, 2015: The price of oil continues to rise, but for how long? This morning we check on the latest in the global energy market. Next, the for-profit prison industry is adjusting as the number of U.S. inmates is falling. Finally, British voters will take part in the tightest national election for decades this week. We explore how Scotland could hold the balance of power in tomorrow's election.
